title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Markov Models: The basic Markov process, Flow-graph analysis of Markov processes, Transient Markov processes, Markov process statistics, Recurrent events and random walks, Time-varying Markov processes. Semi-Markov and Decision Models: Discrete-time and continuous semi-Markov processes, Reward structures, sequential decision processes and dynamic programming solutions, Value and Policy iteration in semi-Markov decision processes. Ref.: Dynamic Probabilistic Systems, Vol. I and Vol. II, Ronald A. Howard, John Wiley and Sons, Inc., 1971.
